price: 3. (Alle) wuxuu u abuuray samooyinka iyo arlada Xaq. Waa ka Sarreeyaa oo ka Kor yahay shariig ama in wax lala mid dhigo.
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi taʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
